cloud.title: Hardware
cloud.description: Diverse high-quality products, comprehensively meeting the needs for servers, network devices, PCs, laptops, monitors, surveillance cameras, etc., while deeply understanding the unique needs and challenges of each business, supporting customers in choosing the most suitable and optimized products in terms of both performance and operational costs.

firewall.title: Security
firewall.description: Strong antivirus solutions, endpoint protection, against various types of malware, ransomware, ensuring data safety for businesses, effectively supporting centralized management.

consult.title: System Monitoring
consult.description: Real-time monitoring of network systems, servers, applications, quickly detecting and handling incidents, helping businesses optimize IT operational efficiency.

service.title: Operating System
service.description: Popular, stable, secure operating systems, suitable for various business scales.

rescue.title: Virtualization
rescue.description: Leading virtualization platform in the world, helping to optimize resource usage, increase performance, ensure availability and flexibility.
